text.div:
QuestionnaireResponse_Revoke_Health_Certificate

OPERATION: QuestionnaireResponse_Revoke_Health_Certificate

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/OperationDefinition/DDCCRevokeHealthCertificate

Revoke a DDCC Document.

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INid1..1id

The DDCC id of the DDCC Document.

OUTreturn1..1boolean

A boolean to determine if the revocation was successful or not.

name: QuestionnaireResponse_Revoke_Health_Certificate
title: OperationDefinition for revoking a health certificate (DDCC).

parameter.name: id
parameter.documentation: The DDCC id of the DDCC Document.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A boolean to determine if the revocation was successful or not.
